notice.ch: 本課程由顏宏元、陳洲生、郭俊翔共同合授。暑假上課(2024年7月)

remark.ch: 本課程由顏宏元、陳洲生、郭俊翔共同合授。暑假上課(2024年7月)

goal.ch:
1. To provide a general overview of the bases and application of Electromagnetic (EM) methods in crust, mining, petroleum, geothermal, and groundwater exploration. 

2. To study certain aspects of electrical exploration in depth, via case history study, numerical modeling, plus review of historical and current developments.
goal.en:
1. To provide a general overview of the bases and application of Electromagnetic (EM) methods in crust, mining, petroleum, geothermal, and groundwater exploration. 

2. To study certain aspects of electrical exploration in depth, via case history study, numerical modeling, plus review of historical and current developments.

outline.ch:
1. Basic EM theory
2. Electrical conduction in rocks
3. Resistivity (DC) method
4. TEM method
5. MT method
6. Concluding remarks
7. Case history from Journal of Applied Geophysics
outline.en:
1. Basic EM theory
2. Electrical conduction in rocks
3. Resistivity (DC) method
4. TEM method
5. MT method
6. Concluding remarks
7. Case history from Journal of Applied Geophysics

textbook.ch:
1. Lowrie, Willian, 2007, Fundamentals of Geophysics: Chap4: GeoElectricity, 
2. Telford, W. M., Geldart, L. P・，Sheriff, R. E.. and Keys D A, 1976, Applied geophysics, Cambridge Univ. Press
3. Nabighian, M. N, 1987, Electromagnetic methods in applied geophysics – Vol1 Theory, SEG.
4. Nabighian, M. N, 1991, Electromagnetic methods in applied geophysics - Vbl.2 Applications, SEG.
5. Ward, S. H, Geotechnical and environmental geophysics, SEG.
6.  Ward, S. H, et al., Mining Geophysics, SEG.
7.  Keller, G. V., and F. C. Frischknecht, 1996, Electrical methods in geophysical prospecting. New York, Pergamon Press, Inc.
8. Cheng. D. K., 1989. Field and Wave Electromagnetics, Addison - Wesley Publishing Company. Chap. 7 ＆ 8
textbook.en:
1. Lowrie, Willian, 2007, Fundamentals of Geophysics: Chap4: GeoElectricity, 
2. Telford, W. M., Geldart, L. P・，Sheriff, R. E.. and Keys D A, 1976, Applied geophysics, Cambridge Univ. Press
3. Nabighian, M. N, 1987, Electromagnetic methods in applied geophysics – Vol1 Theory, SEG.
4. Nabighian, M. N, 1991, Electromagnetic methods in applied geophysics - Vbl.2 Applications, SEG.
5. Ward, S. H, Geotechnical and environmental geophysics, SEG.
6.  Ward, S. H, et al., Mining Geophysics, SEG.
7.  Keller, G. V., and F. C. Frischknecht, 1996, Electrical methods in geophysical prospecting. New York, Pergamon Press, Inc.
